scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[branch][field0] To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,PRACK,UPDATE,OPTIONS,INFO,MESSAGE,NOTIFY Supported: 100rel,timer Session-Expires: 1800 Content-Type: application/sdp P-Early-Media: supported Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=[field0] 3742437666 3742437670 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=session SDP c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 18 0 103 104 a=ptime:20 a=rtpmap:103 EG7291/16000/1 a=rtpmap:104 SILK/16000/1 a=sendrecv
CANCEL sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via] [last_From] To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> [last_Call-ID] CSeq: [cseq] CANCEL Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
ACK sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via] [last_From] [last_To] [last_Call-ID] [routes] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
